meanings.sent1: I will reenvision my future to include more travel.
meanings.sent2: She likes to reenvision fairy tales with modern twists.
meanings.sent3: Let's reenvision the school play as a space adventure!
meanings.sent4: Reenvisioning the garden as a jungle brought new life to the backyard.
meanings.sent5: The artist's ability to reenvision reality is truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: To imagine or conceive in a new way.
meanings.sent1: They decided to reenvision the old building as a community center.
meanings.sent2: He often reenvisions historical events with a creative flair.
meanings.sent3: The chef's challenge was to reenvision classic dishes with a modern twist.
meanings.sent4: Reenvisioning the problem as an opportunity led to a breakthrough.
meanings.sent5: Her talent lies in her ability to reenvision the world through her art.
